narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Community Hospital of San Bernardino is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in San Bernardino, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $114.2M in Medicaid payments across 1.6M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $114.2M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,270 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
